ygData.subject: ScopePlusOneDecideRule in 3.2?
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings. I am moving from 1.14 to 3.2 and am trying to add a bean with the ScopePlusOneDecideRule as it allowed me to capture files not stored on the crawl
